definitions.definition: The drift of a ship or aeroplane in a leeward direction.
A varying degree or amount of freedom or flexibility .
examples: I don't think we have a lot of leeway when it comes to proper formatting.

definitions.definition: An adverse discrepancy or variation in a cumulative process, usually in the phrase make up leeway .

main_definition: The drift of a ship or aeroplane in a leeward direction.
secondary_definitions: A varying degree or amount of freedom or flexibility .
( British ) An adverse discrepancy or variation in a cumulative process, usually in the phrase make up leeway .
